subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The former Champ Car star Patrick Carpentier signed with Gillett Evernham Motorsports to drive the No. 10 Dodge in the Nextel Cup series. Carpentier is replacing Scott Riggs, who is leaving to drive for Haas CNC Racing next season. Carpentier, a Quebec native, appears to be a good fit for the Gilletts, who hope he will attract Canadian businesses to Nascar. The team is currently looking for a primary sponsor for the No. 10.
